label: LinearRing
comment: An array of points which define a closed loop which is not self intersecting.

datatypeProperties.comment: A coordinate, expressed as text, for this specified linear ring. linear ring must contain min 3 points

objectProperties.comment: The geographical object characteristic associated with this linear ring.
The specified direct position of a coordinate for this linear ring.
Geographical coordinate information specified for this linear ring. If used, linear ring must contain a minimum of 3 geographical coordinate points

referencedBy.comment: The exterior linear specified ring for this polygon.
An interior linear ring specified for this polygon.
